FilterFromCmdLine.hh

00001 #ifndef __FILTER_FROM_CMDLINE_HH__
00002 #define __FILTER_FROM_CMDLINE_HH__
00003 
00004 #include "Configuration.h"
00005 #include <fastjet/tools/Filter.hh>
00006 #include <fastjet/tools/BackgroundEstimatorBase.hh>
00007 #include "SelectorArea.hh"
00008 #include <sstream>
00009 
00010 // this is simply a small util that allows you to specify a filter
00011 // from the command line using
00012 //
00013 //    --filter=...
00014 //
00015 // ['filter' can be replaced by an optional string if needed]
00016 //
00017 // The argument is interpreted as follows:
00018 //
00019 //   - hardest_<xfilt>_<nfilt> (with Rfilt a double and Rfilt an
00020 //     integer) will recluster with a radius xfilt.R (R being the
00021 //     original jet radius) and keep the nfilt hardest subjets
00022 //
00023 //   - trim_<xfilt> (with xfilt a double) will recluster with a radius
00024 //     0.2 and keep the subjets with ptsub/pt > xfilt.
00025 //
00026 //   - area_xsigma (with xfilt a double) will recluster with a radius
00027 //     0.2 and keep the subjets with ptsub(subtracted) > xfilt sigma sqrt(A).
00028 //
00029 
00030 namespace Configuration{
00031 
00032   bool getFilter(fastjet::Filter &filter, 
00033                  double Rjet, fastjet::BackgroundEstimatorBase *bge=0,
00034                  const std::string name="filter"){
00035     std::string value;
00036     if (!getConfig(name, value)) return false;
00037 
00038     // try to parse the value
00039     //
00040     if ((value.size()>=9) && (value.compare(0,8,"hardest_")==0)){
00041       // hardest
00042       size_t sep_pos = value.rfind("_");
00043       if (sep_pos==7){
00044         Services::Print::error("Configuration::getFilter",
00045                                "hardest_xfilt_nfilt filter syntax not understood.\n", value.c_str());
00046         return false;
00047       }
00048 
00049       std::istringstream iss1(value.substr(8, (sep_pos-8)));
00050       std::istringstream iss2(value.substr(sep_pos+1));
00051       double xfilt;
00052       unsigned int nfilt;
00053       iss1 >> xfilt;
00054       iss2 >> nfilt;
00055       
00056       filter = fastjet::Filter(fastjet::JetDefinition(fastjet::cambridge_algorithm, xfilt*Rjet),
00057                                fastjet::SelectorNHardest(nfilt));
00058     } else if ((value.size()>=5) && (value.compare(0,5,"trim_")==0)){
00059       // trimming
00060       std::istringstream iss(value.substr(5));
00061       double xfilt;
00062       iss >> xfilt;
00063       filter = fastjet::Filter(fastjet::JetDefinition(fastjet::cambridge_algorithm, 0.2),
00064                                fastjet::SelectorPtFractionMin(xfilt));      
00065     } else if ((value.size()>=5) && (value.compare(0,5,"area_")==0)){
00066       // area filter
00067       std::istringstream iss(value.substr(5));
00068       double area_n;
00069       iss >> area_n;
00070       if (! bge){
00071         Services::Print::error("Configuration::getFilter",
00072                                "requested and area filter without specifying a background estimator).\n", value.c_str());
00073         return false;
00074       }
00075       filter = fastjet::Filter(fastjet::JetDefinition(fastjet::cambridge_algorithm, 0.2),
00076                                fastjet::SelectorAreaRhoThreshold(bge, 0.0, area_n));
00077     } else {
00078       Services::Print::error("Configuration::getFilter",
00079                              "filter specifiaction (%s) not understood.\n", value.c_str());
00080       return false;
00081     }
00082 
00083     return true;
00084   }
00085 
00086 }
00087 #endif  // __FILTER_FROM_CMDLINE_HH__
